articles.author: https://www.nytimes.com/by/alan-rappeport
articles.title: Big Banks to Get Reprieve from Volcker Rule
articles.description: The Fed proposed loosening the Volcker Rule, which prevents banks from trading with depositors’ money, a move that is expected to give banks more flexibility to engage in complicated trades.

articles.author: https://www.nytimes.com/by/ana-swanson
articles.title: With Trade Talks at an Impasse, Tariffs on Allies Loom
articles.description: President Trump must decide whether to go ahead with tariffs on allies like the European Union, Canada and Mexico, whose temporary exemptions to the tariffs expire Friday.

articles.title: Trump Responds to Fury Over Roseanne, but Not Her Racist Remarks
articles.description: President Trump acknowledged the furor over a racist Twitter post made by Roseanne Barr, but focused on the apology issued by ABC.

articles.author: https://www.nytimes.com/by/john-koblin
articles.title: Pride Working on ‘Roseanne,’ but ‘Just Brutal’ Pressure Off the Set
articles.description: The sitcom’s staff was heartened by its success, but Roseanne Barr’s volatile Twitter presence soon became a distraction before ultimately ending the show.

articles.title: Roseanne Barr, Back on Twitter, Has More to Say
articles.description: After the cancellation of her sitcom, she returned to the platform where she had made the statement that led to her downfall.

articles.author: http://www.nytimes.com/by/benedict-carey
articles.title: Roseanne Barr’s ‘Ambien-Tweeting,’ Explained. Sorta.
articles.description: The drug can cause unusual behavior, research shows. But online insults? Not likely.

articles.author: http://www.nytimes.com/by/matt-apuzzo, https://www.nytimes.com/by/adam-goldman, http://www.nytimes.com/by/michael-s-schmidt
articles.title: F.B.I. Official Wrote Secret Memo Fearing Trump Got a Cover Story for Comey Firing
articles.description: Andrew McCabe documented a meeting that left him concerned that the deputy attorney general may have helped President Trump create a cover story to justify the dismissal.

articles.title: Trump Again Says He Wishes Sessions Was Not Attorney General
articles.description: President Trump said on Twitter that he wished he had chosen another good lawyer to be his attorney general.

articles.author: http://www.nytimes.com/by/alan-feuer, http://www.nytimes.com/by/benjamin-weiser
articles.title: Judge Suggests Review of Cohen Documents Is Moving Too Slowly
articles.description: A federal judge for Mr. Cohen were given a June 15 deadline to review the documents seized from his office, apartment and hotel room.

articles.author: http://www.nytimes.com/by/eric-schmitt
articles.title: Battle to Stamp Out ISIS in Syria Gains New Momentum, but Threats Remain
articles.description: The return of top Syrian Kurdish commanders, a surge in French commandos, the arrival of Navy fighter jets and sleuthing by Iraqi spies have revived an effort that had stalled out.
